event.title: FOSDEM '25 - Legal and Policy Issues DevRoom in Brussels, Belgium

body.p: One more time, the FSFE, together with our co-hosts, is proud to organize the Legal and Policy Issues devroom, a popular track focused on the political and legal challenges in the realm of software freedom.
FOSDEM 2025 is taking place on 1 and 2 February at the ULB Solbosch Campus, Brussels
